verbs.description: [ARG0: survivors of child sexual abuse] [V: call] [ARG1: for pa senate to return to capitol to act on reforms] they called on the senate to return to harrisburg to vote on a bill that includes a window to allow clergy sex abuse victims to file civil lawsuits even if the abuse occurred decades ago and is beyond the statutes of limitation harrisburg senate joseph b scarnati joe scarnati abuse united states senate child sexual abuse jefferson county pa president sexual abuse gop harrisburg pennsylvania
